DTField.Name: CONSIGNEE
DTField.Label: CONSIGNEE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Client for which the Flow Through is created.

DTField.Name: FLOWTHROUGH
DTField.Label: FLOWTHROUGH
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Used for tracking the Flow Through while in delivery.

DTField.Name: ORDERTYPE
DTField.Label: ORDERTYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The type of Flow Through order according to the function that it will fulfill.

DTField.Name: REFERENCEORD
DTField.Label: REFERENCEORD
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The ID of the host order.

DTField.Name: SOURCECOMPANY
DTField.Label: SOURCECOMPANY
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Company from which the Flow Through is ordered.

DTField.Name: SOURCECOMPANYTYPE
DTField.Label: SOURCECOMPANYTYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The type of Company from which the Flow Through is ordered.

DTField.Name: TARGETCOMPANY
DTField.Label: TARGETCOMPANY
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Company to which the Flow Through is designated.

DTField.Name: TARGETCOMPANYTYPE
DTField.Label: TARGETCOMPANYTYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The type of Company from to the Flow Through is to be sent.

DTField.Name: STATUS
DTField.Label: STATUS
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Determined according to functions preformed of the order.

DTField.Name: STATUSDATE
DTField.Label: STATUSDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which the order status last changed.

DTField.Name: NOTES
DTField.Label: NOTES
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Notes regarding the Flow Through.

DTField.Name: CREATEDATE
DTField.Label: CREATEDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which the Flow Through was created.

DTField.Name: SCHEDULEDARRIVALDATE
DTField.Label: SCHEDULEDARRIVALDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which the Flow Through is scheduled to arrive.

DTField.Name: REQUESTEDDELIVERYDATE
DTField.Label: REQUESTEDDELIVERYDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which the F-Through was requested to be delivered.

DTField.Name: SCHEDULEDDELIVERYDATE
DTField.Label: SCHEDULEDDELIVERYDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date the Flow Through is scheduled to be delivered.

DTField.Name: SHIPPEDDATE
DTField.Label: SHIPPEDDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which the Flow Through was shipped.

DTField.Name: STAGINGLANE
DTField.Label: STAGINGLANE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Staging Lane from which the Flow Through is to be loaded for shipment.

DTField.Name: SHIPMENT
DTField.Label: SHIPMENT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Shipment that the Flow Through is assigned to.

DTField.Name: STOPNUMBER
DTField.Label: STOPNUMBER
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The position of the Flow Through in the Routing Line.

DTField.Name: LOADINGSEQ
DTField.Label: LOADINGSEQ
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The sequence according to which Flow Through (orders) that are to be shipped will be loaded.

DTField.Name: ROUTINGSET
DTField.Label: ROUTINGSET
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Routing Set to which the Flow Through is assigned.

DTField.Name: ROUTE
DTField.Label: ROUTE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Flow Through Rout.

DTField.Name: DELIVERYSTATUS
DTField.Label: DELIVERYSTATUS
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Used for tracking the Order while in delivery.

DTField.Name: POD
DTField.Label: POD
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The file containing the proof that the F-Through was delivered.

DTField.Name: ORDERPRIORITY
DTField.Label: ORDERPRIORITY
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Enables users to manage Flow Through orders according to priority.

DTField.Name: ADDDATE
DTField.Label: ADDDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which data was added.

DTField.Name: ADDUSER
DTField.Label: ADDUSER
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The user who added the data.

DTField.Name: EDITDATE
DTField.Label: EDITDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which data was edited.

DTField.Name: EDITUSER
DTField.Label: EDITUSER
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The user who last edited the data.
